---
title: "Data Import"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

```

let's import a dataset. 

```{r}
litters_df =
  read_csv("data/FAS_litters.csv")
```

Look at your data!

```{r}
names(litters_df)
```

Update the names in `litters_df`.

```{r}
litters_df = 
  janitor::clean_names(litters_df)
```

Look at the data

```{r}
litters_df
```

Sometimes skimming data is net

```{r}
skimr::skim(litters_df)
```
